basic_information.scholarship_name: Jazz Studies Division Support Fund Scholarship-NOMINATION

description: This scholarship was established in 2014 by adjunct faculty member Dr. Larry Sherman as part of a larger fund to support the activities of the jazz studies division. Eligibility Student in the Jazz Studies division Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator. Not awarded until late July.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
